name: assign_construction_set_to_building

arguments.name: construction_set
arguments.display_name: Set the Default Construction Set for the Building

modeler_description: What this is classified as opaque, it also affects fenestration.
description: This will assign an existing construction set to the building object. This will impact surfaces that don't have construction sets already assigned at story, space type, space, or surfaces with hard assigned constructions.
